mapper.select: select c_id as cId, c_name as cName, c_target as cTarget, to_char(d_create_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as dCreateTime, (select tsc.c_name from t_sys_code tsc where txl.c_valid = tsc.c_id and c_pid = '100101') as cValid from t_xtpz_link txl order by d_create_time desc
select c_id as cId, c_name as cName, c_target as cTarget, d_create_time as dCreateTime from t_xtpz_link txl where c_valid = '1' order by d_create_time desc
